attributes.action: Carers to move freely in care sector without need for sponsorship
attributes.additional_details:
underpaid by sponsors
bizzare working hours  6am to 11pm 
no work life balance
stuck with employer unless you are willing to move miles away
no voice as we are immigrants
bad working conditions
no chances of growth
attributes.background: instability for our families and bad working conditions

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701137
